channel.title: Greenground // Soundcloud // Season 2
channel.description: When we first envisioned Greenground.it, it was more than just another news platform. It was conceived as an innovation lab—a pilot initiative designed to challenge the existing paradigms of news automation. Utilizing the transformative powers of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning, along with tools like IFTTT (If This Then That) and Syndication, Greenground.it stands at the cutting edge of a revolution set to reshape how information is consumed.

item.title: Nationwide strike on January 12–13: transport disruptions expected across Italy
item.itunes:author: Livio Andrea Acerbo
item.itunes:summary: A nationwide strike is scheduled for January 12–13 and may cause significant disruptions to public transport and related services in several Italian cities. The industrial action, called by trade unions, focuses on working conditions, wages, and contract renewals. Cancellations and delays are expected to affect trains, metros, buses, and flights, while legally mandated minimum service levels will be maintained. Travelers are advised to check service updates in advance, plan alternative routes, and follow official announcements from local operators.
item.itunes:subtitle: A nationwide strike is scheduled for January 12–1…
item.description: A nationwide strike is scheduled for January 12–13 and may cause significant disruptions to public transport and related services in several Italian cities. The industrial action, called by trade unions, focuses on working conditions, wages, and contract renewals. Cancellations and delays are expected to affect trains, metros, buses, and flights, while legally mandated minimum service levels will be maintained. Travelers are advised to check service updates in advance, plan alternative routes, and follow official announcements from local operators.

item.title: Unlocking Consent Revolution with CONSENSO.ONLINE #ConsentMatters #EmpowermentNow

item.itunes:summary: 🔊 Discover the Future of Consent: Introducing CONSENSO.ONLINE 🎉 Consent isn’t just a detail—it’s a conscious, free choice! In Italy, the discussion on sexual consent is evolving. item.title: Chilling Events: Bondi Massacre, Thailand-Cambodia War & Indonesia Floods #WorldNews
item.itunes:author: Livio Andrea Acerbo
item.itunes:summary: 🚨 **Devastating news from Bondi Beach: mass shooting takes 15 lives, shocking Australia with antisemitic violence.** The Thailand-Cambodia border erupts into conflict as bombings threaten families. Meanwhile, Indonesia faces Cyclone Senyar’s wrath, with floods claiming 604 lives and leaving 464 missing. In the US, a New Year’s Eve bomb plot is thwarted, while the EU tightens the grip on Russian oil sanctions. Plus, Belarus releases a Nobel laureate. 🌍 Dive into today’s essential global headlines with Alvin. What story impacts you most? Engage in the comments, LIKE to stay updated, SUBSCRIBE for daily insights, & SHARE for wider awareness! #WorldNewsToday #AntisemiticAttack #BondiBeachShooting #ThailandCambodiaConflict #IndonesiaFloods #USNews #EUNews
